chapter.text: Alif Lam Ra lawa ngamavesi encwadi neQur’an ecacile
Mhlawumbe	labo	abangakholwanga	bayofisa	sengathi babezinikele ngaphansi kwentando kaMvelinqangi
Bayeke bazidlele, bazijabulise futhi babanjezelwe ithemba (elingeyilutho) ngakho-ke bazokwazi
Futhi asizange silibhubhise idolobha ngaphandle kokuba kwakuyisimemezelo salo esaziwayo
Asikho isizwe esingajahisa phambili isikhathi saso noma sisilibazise
Futhi bathi, “Oh wena! Okwembulwe kuye isikhumbuzo (iQur’an) ngempela wena uyahlanya”
Kungani	ungezi	kuthina	nezingelosi	uma	kungukuthi ungomunye wabaneqiniso na
Asizithumeli	izingelosi	phansi	ngaphandle	uma	(ziza) nesijeziso futhi (abangakholwayo) angeke banikwe ithuba
Ngempela thina sasembula isikhumbuzo (iQur’an) futhi ngempela thina singabalondolozi baso
Futhi	ngempela	sathumela	(izithunywa)	ngaphambilini kwakho (Oh Muhammad!) phakathi kwabantu basendulo
Futhi sasingafiki kubona isithunywa ngaphandle kokuba basenze inhlekisa
Sikwenze kanjalo ukuba kungene ezinhliziyweni zezoni
Abakholelwa kuyona (iQur’an) futhi ngempela sesadlula isibonelo salabo basendulo
Futhi	noma	ngabe	sabavulela	umnyango	wezulu babezoqhubeka bakhuphuke lapho
Babezothi, “kuphela amehlo ethu abexhoshiwe kepha thina singabantu abalunjiwe.”
Futhi ngempela sabeka izinkanyezi ezinkulu ezulwini futhi sazenza zabukeka zizinhle kwabazibonayo
Futhi saliqaphela kubona bonke osathane abagxoshiwe (embusweni kaMvelinqangi)
Ngaphandle kwalowo (sathane) ontshontsha ukulalela ngakho-ke ulandelwa ilangabi eligqamile
Nomhlaba sawendlala senza kuwona izintaba ezisimeme futhi senza ukuthi kumile kuwona zonke izinto ngendlela efanele
Futhi sanenzela kuwona izindlela zokuphila kanye nalezo (zidalwa) eningazondli (izinkomo nokunye)
Futhi akukho lutho olungekho kepha kuthina kunokugcinwa kwako futhi angeke sikwehlisele phansi ngaphandle ngesilinganiso esaziwayo
Futhi sathumela imimoya ukuze ivundise sabe sesinethisa imvula evela esibhakabhakeni ukuze siniphuzise yona futhi nina aniyibona abagcini bayo (imvula)
Futhi ngempela thina siyaphilisa futhi siyabulala futhi siyizindlalifa
Futhi ngempela siyabazi abeza kuqala kunani (izizukulwane ezafika ngaphambilini kwenu) futhi ngempela siyabazi abayoza emveni (kwalokho)
Futhi ngempela iNkosi yakho iyobaqoqela ndawonye, ngempela yona inobuhlakani iyazi
Futhi ngempela samdala umuntu ngobumba olomile olubhucukile oluqhamuka emhlabathini ecwelekile
NamaJinn sawadala ngaphambilini ngamalangabi omlilo
Futhi (khumbula) ngenkathi iNkosi yakho ithi ezingelosini ngempela mina ngingumdali womuntu ngobumba olomileyo ocubuzekile oluqhamuka emhlabathini ocwelekileyo
Ngakho-ke kwathi lapho sengimenzile (u-Adam) ngaphefumulela umoya wami kuyena ngakho-ke ngathi yiwani nimkhothamele
Ngakho-ke izingelosi zamkhothamela zonke
Ngaphandle kuka-Iblis wenqaba ukuthi abe kanye nabakhothamayo
(UMvelinqangi) wathi, “Oh Iblis! kwenzenjani ngawe ukuthi ungabi kanye nabakhothamayo na?”
Wathi (u-Iblis) “angeke ngikwazi ukukhothamela umuntu owamdala ngobumba olucubuzekileyo oluphuma emhlabathini ocwelekileyo”
Wathi (uMvelinqangi) phuma kulona (izulu) ngakho-ke ngempela wena ungogxoshiweyo (embusweni wezulu)
Futhi ngempela phezu kwakho kunesiqalekiso kuze kube ilanga lokuvuka kwabafileyo.”
(U-Iblis) wathi, “Nkosi yami nginike ithuba kuze kube usuku lokuvuswa kwabafileyo”
Wathi (uMvelinqangi) ngempela wena ungomunye wabanikwe ithuba
Kuze kube usuku lwesikhathi esiqokiwe
(U-Iblis) wathi, “Nkosi yami ngokuba ungidukisile ngempela ngizokwenza (ukona) kubukeke kukuhle kubona (abantu) emhlabeni futhi ngempela ngizobadukisa bonke.”
Ngaphandle kwezinceku zakho (eziholiwe) phakathi kwabo
Wathi “lena indlela yami eqondile (elungileyo).”
Ngempela ezincekwini zami awunagunya phezu kwazo ngaphandle kwalezo ezikulandelayo ezidukileyo
Futhi ngempela isihogo siyisithembiso sabo bonke (labo abalandela u-Iblis)
Sinamasango ayisikhombisa isango nesango lalawomasango kunengxenye (yezoni) ebekiwe (kulona)
Ngempela	abenza	okulungileyo	bayohlala	ezivandeni nasemithonjeni yamanzi
(Kuyothiwa kubona), “Ngenani kusona (isivande) ngokuthula niphephile”
Futhi siyosusa konke okusezifubeni zabo okubi okuyinzondo bahlale njengabazalwane ezihlalweni eziqhwakele ezibhekene
Angeke kubathinte ukukhathazeka khona lapho (esivandeni) futhi bona angeke bakhishwe kusona
Zitshele	izinceku	zami	ukuthi	mina	ngiyathethelela nginesihawu
Nokuthi isijeziso sami siyisijeziso esibuhlungu
Futhi batshele ngezivakashi zika-Abrahamu
Khumbula ngenkathi zingena kuyena ngakho-ke zathi, “ukuthula” yena wathi “ngempela siyanesaba”
Izivakashi (izingelosi) zathi, “ungesabi ngempela thina sikulethela izindaba ezimnandi zomfana onolwazi.”
Wathi (u-Abrahamu), “Ngakube ningilethele izindaba ezimnandi kulapho sengificwe ukukhula (ukuguga) ningitshela izindaba ezimnandi ngani na
Zathi (izingelosi) sikulethele izindabaezimnandingokweqiniso ngakho-ke ungabi ngomunye wabalahlekelwe yithemba
Wathi (u-Abrahamu) “ngubani ongalahlekelwa yithemba lomusa weNkosi yakhe ngaphandle kwabadukileyo na?”
(U-Abrahamu waphinde) wathi “nizokwenzani (lapha) Oh! Nina! zithunywa na?”
Zathi (izingelosi), “ngempela thina sithunywe ebantwini abayizoni.”
Ngaphandle komndeni kaLothi ngempela sizobasindisa bonke (ekubhujisweni)
Ngaphandle konkosikazi wakhe esimthatha njengokuthi ngempela yena ungomunye wabasalela ngemumva
Ngakho-ke kwathi lapho sezifika izithunywa ebantwini baLothi
Wathi “ngempela nina ningabantu abangaziwa”
Zathi, (izithunywa) “Qhabo size lapha kuwena nalokho abangabaza ngakho”
Futhi size kuwena neqiniso, ngempela thina singabaneqiniso
Ngakho-ke hamba nomndeni wakho ngengxenye yobusuku futhi ubalandele ngemumva futhi kungabi khona ngisho noyedwa wenu ozobheka ngemumva futhi niye lapho eniphoqwe ukuya khona
Futhi salwenza lwazeka kuyena lelo daba ukuthi izimpande zalaba (abayizoni) zizonqunywa ekuseni
Futhi abantu bedolobha bafika begcwele injabulo
Wathi	“ngempela	lezi	izihambeli	zami	ngakho-ke ningangihlazi.”
Futhi sabani uMvelinqangi futhi ningangihlazi
Bathi	(abantu	baLothi)	“asizange	yini	sikwenqabele (ekungeniseni) abantu na?”
Wathi	(uLothi)	“lawa	ngamadodakazi	ami	uma	nina ningabenzi (bokuhle).”
(Isifungo)	ngempilo	yakho!	Ngempela	bona	badideke umqondo bayaphuphutheka njengezimpumputhe
Ngakho-ke bathathwa ukukhala (umsindo) owesabekayo ngesikhathi sokuphuma kwelanga
Ngakho-ke (idolobha lase-Sodom) saligumbuqela phansi futhi sanethisa phezu kwabo amatshe obumba olugazingiwe
Ngempela kulokhu kunezimpawu kulabo ababonayo
Futhi ngempela lona (idolobha laseSodom) lalisemgaqweni omkhulu
Ngempela kulokho kunophawu kubantu abakholwayo
Futhi izihlali zasehlathini (abantu baseMidyan) ngempela babengalungile
Ngakho-ke saziphindisela kubona futhi ngempela wona womabili (amadolobha) asemgaqweni osobala
Futhi ngempela izihlali zase-Hijr zaziphika izithunywa
Futhi sabanikeza izimpawu zethu kepha abazinakanga (bazifulathela)
Futhi babeqopha izintaba ukuze bakhe izindlu (bazizwe) bephephile
Ngakho-ke umsindo owesabekayo wabathatha ngesikhathi sasekuseni
Ngakho-ke akubazuzelanga lutho lokho ababekusebenzela
Futhi asizange siwadale amazulu nomhlaba kanye nakho konke okuphakathi kwako kokubili ngaphandle kweqiniso futhi ngempela ihora liyeza ngakho-ke thethelela ngentethelelo emnene
Ngempela iNkosi yakho ingumdali (wamazulu nomhlaba) iyisazi
Futhi ngempela sikunikezile (amavesi) ayisikhombisa aphindaphindiwe (Surah Fatiha) kanye neQur’an enkulu (engcwele)
Ungaphonsi amehlo akho kulokho esikuphe abanye phakathi kwabo njengesipho ukuze bazitike ngakho futhi ungabi lusizi ngabo yehlisela amaphiko akho (umusa wakho) phezu kwabakholwayo
Futhi uthi, “ngempela mina ngingumxwayisi ogqamile”
Njengoba sehlisa phezu kwalabo ababehlukanisa
Labo abenza iQur’an ukuthi ibe izingxenye
Ngakho-ke ngifunga ngeNkosi yakho! Siyobabuza bonke ndawonye
Mayelana nalokho ababekwenza
Ngakho-ke	memezela	ngokusobala	ngalokho	ophoqwe ngakho futhi uqhelelane nabakhonzi bezithixo
Ngempela thina sikwenele ukubhekana nabenza inhlekisa
Labo abenza omunye unkulunkulu (isithixo) basihlanganise noMvelinqangi ngakho-ke bayokwazi
Futhi ngempela siyazi ukuthi wena siyacinana isifuba sakho ngenxa yalokho abakushoyo
Ngakho-ke dumisa udumo lweNkosi yakho futhi ube ngomunye wabazithobayo
Futhi khonza iNkosi yakho kuze kube ufikelwe isiqiniseko (ukufa)
